Attribute.AttributeName: [System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, Inherited=false)]

[<System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, Inherited=false)>]

summary.span: 控制程序集中单独托管类型或成员，或所有类型对 COM 的访问性。

span.span: Controls accessibility of an individual managed type or member, or of all types within an assembly, to COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此特性应用于程序集、接口、类、结构、委托、枚举、字段、方法或属性。You can apply this attribute to assemblies, interfaces, classes, structures, delegates, enumerations, fields, methods, or properties. 默认值为 `true` ，指示托管类型对 COM 可见。The default is `true`, which indicates that the managed type is visible to COM. 若要使公共托管程序集和类型可见，则不需要此特性;默认情况下，它们对 COM 可见。This attribute is not needed to make public managed assemblies and types visible; they are visible to COM by default. 只能 `public` 使类型可见。Only `public` types can be made visible. 属性不能用于使对 `internal` `protected` COM 可见或类型可见，或使不可见类型的成员可见。The attribute cannot be used to make an otherwise `internal` or `protected` type visible to COM or to make members of a nonvisible type visible. 如果将程序集的属性设置为， `false` 则会隐藏 `public` 程序集中的所有类型。Setting the attribute to `false` on the assembly hides all `public` types within the assembly. 可以通过将各个类型设置为，在程序集中有选择地使类型可见 `true` 。You can selectively make types within the assembly visible by setting the individual types to `true`. 将特定类型的属性设置为时，将 `false` 隐藏该类型及其成员。Setting the attribute to `false` on a specific type hides that type and its members. 但是，如果类型不可见，则不能使类型的成员可见。However, you cannot make members of a type visible if the type is invisible. 将类型的属性设置为 `false` 时，会阻止将该类型导出到类型库; 类未注册; 接口从不响应非托管 `QueryInterface` 调用。Setting the attribute to `false` on a type prevents that type from being exported to a type library; classes are not registered; interfaces are never responsive to unmanaged `QueryInterface` calls. 除非显式设置类及其成员到 `false` ，否则继承的类可以向在原始类中不可见的 COM 基类成员公开。Unless you explicitly set a class and its members to `false`, inherited classes can expose to COM base class members that are invisible in the original class. 例如，如果将 ClassA 设置为， `false` 但不将该属性应用于其成员，则该类及其成员对 COM 不可见。For example, if you set ClassA to `false` and do not apply the attribute to its members, the class and its members are invisible to COM. 但是，如果从 ClassA 派生 ClassB 并将 ClassB 导出到 COM，ClassA 成员将成为 ClassB 的可见基类成员。However, if you derive ClassB from ClassA and export ClassB to COM, ClassA members become visible base class members of ClassB. 有关导出过程的详细说明，请参阅 [程序集到类型库的转换摘要](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xk1120c3(v=vs.100))。For a detailed description of the export process, see [Assembly to Type Library Conversion Summary](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xk1120c3(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何控制类的 COM 可见性，使其成员不可见。The following example shows how you can control the visibility to COM of a class so that its members are invisible. 通过在 `ComVisibleAttribute` `false` `MyClass` Visual Basic 示例) 中 (设置为 on， `SampleClass` 并且 `false` 在 `MyMethod` 和上 `MyProperty` ，你可以避免意外通过继承将成员公开给 COM。By setting `ComVisibleAttribute` to `false` on `MyClass`(`SampleClass` in the Visual Basic example), and `false` on `MyMethod` and `MyProperty`, you can avoid inadvertently exposing the members to COM through inheritance. [!code-cpp[Classic ComVisibleAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ComVisibleAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ComVisibleAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ComVisibleAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ComVisibleAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ComVisibleAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使类型对 COM 可见，请将属性设置为 `true` 。To make types visible to COM, set the attribute to `true`. 若要隐藏 COM 中的类型，请将属性设置为 `false` 。To hide types from COM, set the attribute to `false`.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 COM 类型是否可见。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the COM type is visible.
